pageTitle: Changes to bus stops at Herne Hill

title.title: Changes to bus stops at Herne Hill

texts: From Saturday 17 April Lambeth Council are introducing a junction improvement scheme at Herne Hill which will mean some changes to bus stops in the area.
From Saturday 17 April Lambeth Council are introducing a junction improvement scheme at Herne Hill which will mean some changes to bus stops in the area.
Routes 3, 196, 201, 322, 690 and N3, which currently use stop A outside Herne Hill Station will have new stopping arrangements due to theÂ  pedestrianisation of the southern stretch of Railton Road.

Southbound buses on these routes will now use stop N on Dulwich Road instead. Northbound buses on the affected routes will continue to use their existing stops (L and M) outside Brockwell Park on Dulwich Road.
A new northbound stop is being introduced on Norwood Road. This will be served by routes 68, 468 and N68.
